title: Ordering at a Local Café
introduction: This lesson simulates a situation where a customer orders food and coffee in a Spanish-speaking café. It introduces relevant vocabulary for menu items, making orders, and interacting with café staff.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Buenos días, me gustaría pedir un café con leche y un croissant de almendras, por favor.
story.translation: Good morning, I would like to order a coffee with milk and an almond croissant, please.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.translation: Of course, would you like anything else?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Sí, también quisiera un vaso de agua.
story.translation: Yes, I would also like a glass of water.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Perfecto. ¿Para tomar aquí o para llevar?
story.translation: Perfect. For here or to go?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Muy bien, enseguida le traigo su pedido.
story.translation: Very well, I'll bring your order right away.
